about_the_game:
This release contains the entire soundtrack of Tainted Grail: Conquest — both the original game music created by veteran composer Andrzej Janicki and tracks that were licensed for the game from Danheim.

Andrzej Janicki is a veteran sound designer and composer known for his work on games such as Layers of Fear, Observer, Blair Witch or The Medium.
